with d scimi interface my special works fine

Idk maby i miss samthing my code for claws interface is

Itemassistant.java

public void sendWeapon(int Weapon, String WeaponName) { } else if (WeaponName2.endsWith("claws")) { c.setSidebarInterface(0, 7762); //claws c.getPA().sendFrame246(7763, 200, Weapon); c.getPA().sendFrame126(WeaponName, 7765);

And this

case 14484: // d Clawz c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7800); specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7812); break;
